name: Pizza Boss
description:
Holy Cow! Matpat the Squirrel and his friends have inherited the responsibility of running an entire pizzeria!
No worries though, with enough determination and teamwork we will make it through!

This is a Pizzeria Simulator game I'm in the progress of making as a Fan Game in tribute to Matpat and his team!

The idea of the game is to balance your workload and workers to earn the most amount of profit in 7 minutes of game time.

Currently the game is just a few of the engines as a working prototype. Eventually it will be more fleshed out!

Stay tuned for future updates!

---Controls---

WASD --- Player Movement

Left Click --- Select Character or Object

Shift --- Show Stations Interface

Space --- Set Station
